summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SetuHub three-sided manpower marketplace. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% test success rate. Frontend UI loads correctly with successful user registration flows for all three personas. Identified interaction issues with Shadcn UI Select components that prevent form submissions.

resolved_issues.issue: Vendor job view endpoint returning 404 - vendor_id not being set in user record after vendor profile creation
resolved_issues.fix_applied: Updated backend to automatically set vendor_id and enterprise_id in user records when profiles are created

ui_bugs.issue: Select dropdown options are not clickable via automation - affects enterprise profile creation, facility creation, and job creation forms
ui_bugs.impact: Prevents completion of profile setup and job posting workflows via UI automation

passed_tests: Backend API - User registration for all three personas (Enterprise, Vendor, Job Seeker)
Backend API - User authentication and login
Backend API - Job posting and management
Backend API - Vendor job filtering and view
Backend API - Dashboard statistics (Enterprise and Vendor)
Backend API - Data persistence and retrieval
Frontend UI - Landing page loads correctly with all elements
Frontend UI - User registration flow for Enterprise users
Frontend UI - User registration flow for Vendor users
Frontend UI - User registration flow for Job Seeker users
Frontend UI - Navigation between different dashboards
Frontend UI - Dashboard layouts and basic UI elements
Frontend UI - Authentication redirects working correctly

success_percentage.frontend: 70% (7/10 major flows tested successfully, 3 blocked by select component issues)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Shadcn UI Select component interactions to enable proper form submissions. The select dropdowns open correctly but options are not clickable. This affects enterprise profile creation, facility management, and job posting workflows. Consider adding data-testid attributes to select options or using a different approach for select components that works better with automation testing.
